meaningMnemonic: The kanji is <kanji>regret</kanji> and this is <vocabulary>regrettable</vocabulary>. Could also be <vocabulary>vexing</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>annoying</vocabulary> as well.
readingMnemonic: It's <vocabulary>regrettable</vocabulary> if you're not <reading>coo</reading>l, <reading>yah</reading> (くや)? Yah, that would be pretty <vocabulary>vexing</vocabulary>.
